goal_meta_link_text: United Nations Sustainable Development Goals Metadata
indicator_name: Proportion of married women and sexually active non-married women from 15-49 years aware of any modern method of contraception
graph_title: Proportion of married women and sexually active non-married women from 15-49 years aware of any modern method of contraception
goal_name: 5. Achieve gender equality and empower all women and girls
target_name: 5.6 Ensure universal access to sexual and reproductive health and reproductive rights as agreed in accordance with the Programme of Action of the International Conference on Population and Development and the Beijing Platform for Action and the outcome documents of their review conferences
indicator_name1: 5.6.1.1 Proportion of married women and sexually active unmarried women aged 15-49 who were aware of the modern method of contraception
organization_name: National Statistical Committee of the Kyrgyz Republic (Department of Household Statistics)
definitions: The proportion of women aged 15-49 (married or in a union) who make their own decisions in all three selected areas, meaning they cannot say no to sexual intercourse with their husband or partner if they do not want to; decide to use contraception; and decide on their own medical care. Only women who provide a "yes" answer to all three components are considered women who "make their own decisions in sexual and reproductive relationships."
rationale_interpretation: The autonomy of women and girls in decision-making on consensual sexual relations, contraceptive use, and access to sexual and reproductive health services is key to their empowerment and full enjoyment of their reproductive rights. Women who make their own decisions about their health are considered authorized to exercise their reproductive rights.
data_sources: Demographic and Health Surveys (DHS), Cluster Multi-indicator Surveys (MICS).
data_collection: This indicator is calculated based on data from the Cluster Multi-Indicator Survey (MICS). The data was collected for the target group - women aged 15-49 years.
computation_methods:
Numerator: the number of married or unionized women aged 15-49:- who can say no to sex; and
- for whom the decision about contraception is mostly not made by the husband/partner; and
- for whom the decision about health care for themselves is usually not made by the husband/partner or someone else.                                                The numerator includes only women who meet all three criteria of authority.                                                                        Denominator: the total number of women aged 15-49 who are married or in a union.
Proportion = Numerator X 100 / Denominator
references_documentation: The National SDG Reporting Platform of the Kyrgyz Republic: https://sustainabledevelopment-kyrgyzstan .github.io
